title: and (c) of section 5 and insofar as that Act is not already in operation, shall
heading: 2. The 1st day of April 2022 is appointed as the day on which the Health
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of April 2022 is appointed as the day on which the Health 
Insurance (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 47 of 2021), other than paragraphs (b) 
and (c) of section 5 and insofar as that Act is not already in operation, shall 
come into operation. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [145] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 March, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [145]

title: and (c) of section 5 and insofar as that Act is not already in operation, shall
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints 1 April 2022 as the date on which the provisions of the 
Health Insurance (Amendment) Act 2021 which concern the operation of the 
new Risk Equalisation Scheme come into effect. Those provisions concern the 
introduction of high cost claim credits to the operation of the Scheme, and of a 
new benchmark for reasonable profit for the purpose of the overcompensation 
test. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [145] 5
